Name: Fall GBM Scoop N' Science
Location:
Fontana Labs 2040
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join SASE for our first GBM of the year where you will learn all about the history and science behind ice cream! Get to know other members as you create your own ice cream out of simple ingredients!!

Name: Sasesibs and escape room
Location:
Fontana Labs 2000
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Interested in studying abroad? Join us for our study abroad panel where you could learn more about experiences, insights, and tips for making the most out of your adventure. Whether you're just curious or ready to pack your bags, this panel will help you navigate the exciting journey of studying abroad!

Name: SaseSibs reveal and windy city
Location:
Fontana Labs 2040
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join us for an exciting event with P&G designed to help you make the most of your upcoming career fair! Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting out, this event will equip you with the tools you need to stand out and succeed. Talk with recruiters about online networking tips, receive help on building your resume, and guidance on crafting the perfect elevator pitch!

Name: GBM 2: SASE Sibs
Location:
Fontana Labs 2000
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Want to build lasting relationships with people of similar interests? Join us on September 19th to learn about our SASEsibs mentorship program and come to meet some potential mentors and mentee that could support your growth and success!

Name: SASE NC 101
Location:
Bowen Ohio Room
2125 N High St
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Learn more about the National Convention, itinerary, and the rest of the details. Come find out how you could part of next year's NC. Attendance is mandatory for those coming to SASE NC 2024.

Name: SASE Sibs Hangout
Location:
Fontana Labs 2000
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Come join us for a casual hangout with your new mentors and other mentee groups. Get to know them better and give yourself a break from studying. Team up with your mentor/mentee group and play some Jeopardy with us.

Name: SASE x ABSA APAMSA Diwali Celebration
Location:
Busch Hall
2036 Neil Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join SASE, ABSA, and APAMSA for a vibrant Diwali celebration! Experience the Festival of Lights with traditional Indian food, exciting games, and beautiful henna art. This collaborative cultural event brings together multiple student organizations to share in the joy and traditions of Diwali. Come celebrate with us and learn about this important cultural festival while enjoying great company and activities.

Name: Tea Night
Location:
Fontana Labs 2000
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join SASE for a night of relaxation and conversation with tea and snacks. This is a great opportunity to unwind and connect with fellow SASE members and friends. No need to bring anything, just come enjoy the company and conversation.

Name: Powering up with First Energy
Location:
Fontana Labs 2000
140 W 19th Ave
Columbus OH, 43210
Description: Join First Energy to learn about career opportunities in the energy sector and see demonstrations of essential safety practices in power distribution. Food will be provided.
